message: Import statement for 'org.hibernate.annotations.SQLDelete' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.hibernate.annotations.Where' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
